Test.name: Do Move
Test.WhatTest: Tests the mobility proactively initiated by an agent by means of a call to the doMove() method.
Test.HowWorkTest: This test requests an example.mobile.MobileAgent to move to another container and then checks it has actually moved by asking its current location. This process is repeated 4 times (including moving to the local container).
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if the agent move correctly.

Test.name: Protocol in transit
Test.WhatTest: Tests the execution of an interaction protocol while an agent is in transit.
Test.HowWorkTest:
The mobile agent initiates a Contract-Net protocol with 3 responders.
Each responder replies with a PROPOSE and puts the name of the container he lives on in the content.
On receiving a PROPOSE the mobile agents moves on the indicated container and accepts all proposals.
When all proposals have been received the mobile agent informs the tester agent.
The same happens for result notifications.
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if the tester agent correctly receives the two INFORMs (one for responses and one for notifications) from the mobile agent.

Test.name: Mobility ontology
Test.WhatTest: Tests the MoveAction and CloneAction of the MobilityOntology.
Test.HowWorkTest:
A mobile agent is started on Container-3.
The tester requests the AMS to MOVE the mobile agent on Container-1 and then waits for a confirmation message from the mobile agent (who sends this message in his afterMove() method).
Then the tester requests the AMS to CLONE the mobile agent on Container-2 and then waits for a confirmation message from the clone (who sends this message in his afterClone() method).
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if the tester agent correctly receives the two CONFIRMs.

Test.name: Clone big agent
Test.WhatTest: Test agent cloning and the transfer of an agent whose status includes a big amount of data.
Test.HowWorkTest: A Vector of 100000 10-byte-long elements (total 1MByte) is created. Then the TesterAgent itself is cloned on a remote container.
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if the tester agent is actually cloned and the Vector is correctly transferred.
